title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 3 FDA-approved therapies approved based on PROs and HR-QoL, showing symptom improvement can be clinically significant.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Develop automated ePRO reminders to improve patient engagement and data quality in ATTR-CM trials.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA requiring PRO data in trials within 12 months, increasing competition for innovative PRO solutions.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias in PRO studies may lead to healthier patients being represented, potentially skewing results.
